entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 1:30 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: SSE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight then light before morning. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon except plus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain or rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon except plus 3 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
